column3: Your Streamflix subscription is renewing!\nWe've raised our prices again to meet shareholder expectations.\nEnjoy paying full price for shows we'll cancel after one season!
Your Pixney Plus subscription is renewing.\nThe mouse demands his tribute. Every month.\nThe nostalgia tax is expensive.
Your Soundify Premium is renewing.\nIt's just the cost of 10 coffees! Or, you know, actual groceries.\nMusic is food for the soul, but your wallet might disagree.
Your Amazin Prime membership is renewing!\nRemember when this was actually affordable?\nEnjoy two-day shipping on regret and buyer's remorse!
Your Hoolu subscription renews today.\nEntertainment or savings? We both know you'll pick entertainment.\nWatch now, worry about rent later!
Your KBO MAX subscription is renewing.\nPremium content deserves premium prices, right?\nEnjoy watching rich people solve problems with money you don't have!
Your Pineapple Music subscription renews today.\nInvesting in vibes! Your savings are crying but your playlist is immaculate.\nYour playlists cost more than therapy would, by the way.
Your ViewTube Premium is renewing!\nWho needs groceries when you can skip ads, right?\nBackground play: enabled. Financial stability: disabled.
Your PlaySphere Plus is renewing.\nYou can't put a price on fun! (Well, you can, and it keeps going up)\nYour K/D ratio is great. Your credit score... not so much.
Your Ybox Game Pass is renewing!\nBest deal in gaming! Hundreds of games to distract you from your bank account.\nAt least your gamerscore is higher than your savings balance!
Your Chatter Nitro is renewing.\nInflation hits hard, but custom emojis hit different!\nYour presence is premium. Your budget is... standard.
